newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch.

text.p: * Microsoft Corp is expected to report second quarter earnings per share of $0.51,compared to $0.44 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 86 Thursday.
* Mellon Bank Corp is expected to report fourth quarter earnings per share of $1.34, compared to $1.16 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 73-1/2.
* Signet Bank Corp is expected to report fourth quarter earnings per share of $0.54, compared to $0.53 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 29-7/8.
* Outboard Marine Corp is expected to report a first quarter loss of $0.25 per share, compared to a loss of $0.34 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 17-1/2.
* General Motors Corp was up 3/8 at 60-3/4 in London following news of a $9.5 billion stock-and-debt deal to sell its Hughes unit to Raytheon Co.
Raytheon closed at 48-1/2. Northrop Grumman Corp, another Hughes suitor, closed at 78.
